title: Unable to see/pick up Corki package due to Mordekaiser ult
body: As Corki, I was in the Morde ult when my package spawned.  Upon exiting the ult, the package was not on my screen.  I could see it on my minimap, but could not click on it and was unable to pick it up for the entire game.

replies.body: Usually I would dismiss this as working as intended and just part of the Death Realm's mechanics, but "make sure Morde doesn't ult you a few seconds before 8:00 or your passive breaks" is a bit much. It doesn't even have to be a good ult by any other measure; as long as Corki is in the Death Realm when The Package spawns, it'll be a worthwhile ult. It's not a bug, but I bet it's an oversight, and I wouldn't be surprised if it got changed.
Oh sorry about that  its probably in the death realm. Thanks for your contribution.
